resources.string: Enter an amount less than or equal to the original transaction amount.
The refund has been sent to %1$s
A reminder has been sent to %1$s.
We\'re sorry. We experienced an issue loading your activity.
We\'re sorry. We experienced an issue loading your customers.
It may take a few minutes to appear on your activity list.
We\'re sorry. We were unable to record that payment.
We\'re sorry. We\'re unable to complete this refund.
We\'re sorry. We\'re unable to complete this refund.
We\'re sorry. That recipient is unable to receive payments. Please contact us for help.
You\'ve already issued a refund for this transaction.
You can\'t refund a payment more than 90 days after the original transaction.
You\'ve already issued a partial refund. Please enter a new amount.
Your account is currently limited. Please contact us for help.
We\'re sorry. Your recipient\'s account is limited so we can\'t complete this payment.
We\'re sorry. Your recipient is unable to receive payments. Please contact us if you need help.
We\'re sorry. We were unable to delete your invoice. Please try again.
Refund amount exceeds your available PayPal balance. Please add more money first.
It looks like you can\'t send emails from this device.
It looks like you can\'t send SMSs from this device.
We\'re sorry. We experienced an issue loading your payment history. Please try again.
There\'s no activity to display right now.\n\nYour payments, invoices and other activity on your account will display here.
We\'re sorry. We were unable to load your activity. Please swipe down to try again.
You don\'t have enough money in your PayPal balance to cover this refund. As such, the full refund amount will be drawn from %1$s. This refund will take 3–5 business days to complete.
If you don\'t have sufficient PayPal balance to cover this refund, the rest of the payment will be drawn from your default payment method.
We\'re sorry. We were unable to record that refund. Please try again.
Welcome to PayPal.\nActivity on your account will appear here.
